title: The six days adventure, or, The new Utopia a comedy as it is acted at his Royal Highness the Duke of York's theatre.
author: Howard, Edward, fl. 1669.
notes: Attributed to Edward Howard.  Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Commendatory verses by Mrs. Behn, Ravenscroft and others prefixed.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
